name.default: Enter the full name of the person who applied
name.maxCharactersExceeded: Full name must be 255 characters or less

application-submitted.default: Select yes if your question is about an ETA that has been submitted

etaReferenceNumber.incorrectFormat: Enter an ETA reference number in the correct format, for example 2021-1111-1111-1111
